steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 4-2010. A 53-year-old 
man with arthralgias, oral ulcers, vision loss, and vocal-cord paralysis.
Stone JH(1), Papaliodis GN, Dunbar MR, Stone JR.

Author information:
(1)Department of Rheumatology, Allergy, and Immunology, Massachusetts General 
Hospital, Boston, USA.
